availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wiley W. Hammons (Johnson County, KY, corporal 65th KY Militia (USA))

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Jilson P. Hammons and Mary Hammons. Married to Telitha Gullett Booth Hammons on September 23, 1863. Resident in Johnson County in 1850. Resident in Johnson County in 1860. Served in the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) as a corporal from May 21, 1864, to June 21, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 90B.
